reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you are like me and are already a fan of Musgo Real shaving cream, then this is just about me describing a great shaving experience with the scent of spiced citrus. The original and spiced citrus scents are great. The lather and slick glide of the razor is hard to beat. I know shaving products and scents are an individual preference. I am just here to say I love this stuff! If you are reading this and curious, order it now! You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lather, scent just okay
reviews.reviewText: Overall really nice lather and smooth shave with a shaving brush and a bowl. Scent wasn't exactly what I was expecting -- would say it's more citrus and less spice - probably more of a summer scent, but nothing unlikeable by any means.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth as glass, and a babyface-close shave
reviews.reviewText: There's nothing I dislike about Musgo Real Shaving Cream.I use it in the shower, where the water and the steam softens up my face. Just a pinch at the bottom of the tube will give you enough to lather on your face. The scent (I use Spiced Citrus) is subtle and sweet, and the formula has plenty of moisturizers. Not only does my razor glides while it shaves, but with just a flick of the wrist under the shower stream, my razor is clean (I use a Gillette Pro-Glide). The biggest surprise was when I brought my hand up to feel my face-- my shave was so close my hand literally (and I do mean literally) squeaked against my face! The last time my shave was this close I was 16, and I had only two chin hairs back then!To be truthful, I hesitated over the price, but those concerns went away after my first shave. To steal a popular tag line-- you're worth it, and Musgo is definitely worth the money! You cannot get a better shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Underwhelming scent but high quality soap
reviews.reviewText: This soap lathered very easily and made a great soft lather for shaving. My only gripe is that for the price I was expecting the spiced citrus to really be a significant scent that made this stand apart. Honestly it has a nice soap smell thats fresh but I get hardly any citrus or spice from it. Overall its a high quality product but for 24 dollars its a bit too much for me to buy regularly especially when it basically just smells like any fresh soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I'd read about Musgo Real and was anxious to try it. It did NOT disappoint! It lathers up easily, it "slicks" my face nicely for the razor, and the spiced citrus scent is fantastic! Also, it only takes a small amount. I'd read on Badger & Blade to use an almond sized amount. That was plenty for me to get a good four pass shave. Also, there are a LOT of "almond size amounts" in a tube.Also, about the scent. It is very nice without at all being overbearing. You'll catch a whiff from time-to-time, but it doesn't hang over you.Bottom line: Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was really looking forward to this shave cream but feel underwhelmed.I would not call this scent spiced citrus and it was very faint compared to other shave creams I've used.It lathered well but that may be it's only redeeming quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great Claus Porto Musgo Real shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: I love the Musgo Real shaving creams. They have complex, sublime fragrances. The lather works up rich and lasting. You don't have to use a lot for a good morning's shave worth lather. I can heartily recommend this cream.Of course, you will need a shaving brush and bowl (you can use a wide tea/coffee cup from Target or Walmart, no need for a $30 "shaving bowl"). I recommend use of an old-fashioned double-edge (DE) safety razor and quality blade from Gillette or Wilkinson Sword.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great choice. Far better than typical shave creams in the drugstores
reviews.reviewText: High quality with moisturizing benefits. Black Edition is better scent, but this is pleasant.
